title: EDMC lays off 115 at Art Institutes
text:
Published By: Pittsburgh Business News - Today 
Education Management Corp. has cut 115 faculty and staff positions throughout its Art Institute system of schools, including 10 in Pittsburg... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
